pages.text: The Rootgrasp Flower is a sturdy plant with vine-like petals that can bind entities to the earth. Its deep roots extend far into the soil, creating a network of energy that slows movement.

Cultivation Notes:$(br)- Must be planted on Grove Soil$(br)- Goes through 3 growth stages: Seed → Bud → Bloom$(br)- Growth is accelerated when near other plants$(br)- When fully bloomed, applies Slowness to entities that step on it

pages.title: Seeds
pages.text: Rootgrasp Flower Seeds must be planted on Grove Soil. Their growth is stimulated by the presence of other plant life, so a garden environment is ideal for cultivation.

pages.title: Bloom
pages.text: The harvested Rootgrasp Flower Bloom maintains its binding properties and sometimes takes root in your inventory. It is used to create Rootgrasp Spell Essence and serves as a component in earth-binding magical items.
